title: Minced lamb and pea curry
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil or ghee', '2 medium onions, peeled and finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '2.5cm root ginger, peeled and finely chopped', "1 rounded tablespoon mild curry powder (I use Bolst's)", '200g tinned chopped tomatoes', '1 tablespoon white or red wine vinegar', '350ml water', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon sugar', '1 to 3 teaspoons chilli powder, to taste', '450g lamb mince', '150g frozen peas', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh coriander (optional)']
